problems.name: Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus
problems.notes: Initially controlled with diet, now on metformin and insulin. HbA1c trending 7.2-8.8%

problems.name: Chronic Kidney Disease, Stage 3b
problems.notes: Likely diabetic nephropathy. eGFR 35-42. Followed by nephrology.

problems.name: Heart Failure with Reduced Ejection Fraction
problems.notes: EF 35% on last echo. NYHA Class II. On guideline-directed medical therapy.

problems.name: Atrial Fibrillation, Persistent
problems.notes: Rate controlled. Previously on warfarin, discontinued 9/2023 due to major GI bleed. CHA2DS2-VASc score 5, HAS-BLED score elevated. GI recommended against restarting anticoagulation. Currently on aspirin 81mg only for stroke prevention - decision made in conjunction with cardiology and GI.

problems.name: Hyperlipidemia
problems.notes: On high-intensity statin. LDL goal <70 given ASCVD risk.

problems.name: Obesity
problems.notes: BMI 32. Counseled on diet and exercise. Weight loss would benefit multiple conditions.

problems.name: Diabetic Peripheral Neuropathy
problems.notes: Bilateral feet, stocking distribution. On gabapentin for symptom control.
